info.title: Xano Metadata API (beta)
info.description: The Metadata API is currently in beta and is the next evolution of the Developer API. It provides support to programatically manage your Xano instance and uses Access Tokens to control access.

get.summary: Validate the Access Token and identify the account details.
get.description:

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

post.summary: delete table content rows in bulk
post.description:
The request body should contain an array of **row_ids**, where each id identifies a row to be deleted.

Required API Scope: Workspace Content: Delete

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

post.summary: update table content in bulk
post.description:
The request body should contain an array of **items**, where each item represents a row to be updated. For each row, provide the **row_id** and **updates** array that specifies the columns (**path**) to update and the new values (**value**). The example below is assuming that the table being modified has a column labeled *name*.

Required API Scope: Workspace Content: Update

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

post.summary: create new table content in bulk
post.description:
Each table has unique schema, which means that the request body should be an array of objects with the schema relevant to the table being used. The example below is assuming that the table has a column labeled "name".

Required API Scope: Workspace Content: Create

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.
